txt.en: 'The Elfward are a group of exceptionally talented riders and warriors who have sworn loyalty to Thane Elfmar. They have served not only Elfmar, but at times have lent aid to Marshalls Elfhelm, and Ã‰omer. Athelward has requested that Elfmar's riders be sent north to defend the capital, but the Elfward have rejected his summons and have sworn to protect the crofters of Faldham.'
